access_key.description:
The access key (username).
Should be the minio root user or a user with sufficient permissions.

endpoint.description:
The Minio server domain.
Must not include http[s]://!
Eg: my-minio.domain.com

secret_key.description:
The secret key (password).
Should be the minio root user or a user with sufficient permissions.

ssl.description: If true, https:// will be used.

name.description: The name of the bucket. Can not be changed without recreating.

versioning_enabled.description: Enables versioning. Note: this is only available if the Minio server is run with erasure codes enabled. See https://docs.min.io/docs/minio-erasure-code-quickstart-guide

name.description: The name for this policy. This is also the unique ID.

policy.description: The policy definition as a map - will be encoded as JSON. See https://docs.min.io/docs/minio-multi-user-quickstart-guide.html for an example.

policies.description: The policies assigned to this group.

access_key.description: The access key for the user. This is also the unique ID.

groups.description: The names of the groups this user belongs to.

policies.description: The names of the canned policies valid for this user.

secret_key.description: The secret key for the user.

name.description: The name of the bucket. Can not be changed without recreating.

versioning_enabled.description: Enables versioning. Note: this is only available if the Minio server is run with erasure codes enabled. See https://docs.min.io/docs/minio-erasure-code-quickstart-guide

name.description: The name for this policy. This is also the unique ID.

policy.description: The policy definition as a map - will be encoded as JSON. See https://docs.min.io/docs/minio-multi-user-quickstart-guide.html for an example.

policies.description: The policies assigned to this group.

access_key.description: The access key for the user. This is also the unique ID.

groups.description: The names of the groups this user belongs to.

policies.description: The names of the canned policies valid for this user.

secret_key.description: The secret key for the user.
